item.description:
Location: Northeastern University, 360 Huntington Ave,
Boston, MA (Speare-Stetson Quad)
Date: December 5th , 2007
Time: (12:00) 5:00 - 8:00 pm
We are holding a college student voter
registration drive at NEU on December 5th
from 5:00 - 8:00 pm. If we can get enough
volunteers we could do this as a full day
event starting at noon. We can also expect some help from
Northeastern University Students for Paul.

Contact: Michael Casey 617-510-2487 casey.mi@neu.edu
Bob Dwyer 508-930-5530 jukelsa3@yahoo.com


When and Where:

Wednesday, December 5, 2007 at 5:00 PM
Northestern University-Student Hall, Boston , MA 02115
item.name: Ron Paul Voter Registration at Northeastern University
